section.p: The spriggans become quite agitated at the sight of you climbing up. One of them casts a hex on the drainpipe you are climbing, and it buckles under your weight. You fall to the ground with a crash. Lose 1-6 points of Stamina (the roll of one die). If you are still alive, read on.
The spriggans burst into squeaky giggles, leaping up and down, like demented monkeys. You'll have to try a different approach.

choices.choice: Lay out a jug of faery mead
